text: Echt is a railway station located in Echt, Netherlands. The station was opened in 1862 and is located on the Maastricht–Venlo railway. Train services is operated by Arriva. ==Train services== The following local train services call at this station: *Stoptrein: Maastricht Randwyck–Sittard–Roermond ==External links== *NS website *Dutch Public Transport journey planner Category:Railway stations in Limburg (Netherlands) Category:Railway stations opened in 1862 Category:Railway stations on the Staatslijn E Category:Echt-Susteren Category:1862 establishments in the Netherlands
title: Echt railway station
